title: Inventory and Work in Progress Data
summary: This document contains data across three sheets: 'Raw Materials', 'Aged WIP', and 'Provision'. The 'Raw Materials' sheet lists inventory details such as product line, warehouse, part number, description, on-hand quantity, average cost, extended cost, last used date, and usage statistics. The 'Aged WIP' sheet provides information on work orders, sales orders, customer details, part descriptions, values, and aging of work in progress. The 'Provision' sheet includes data on gas turbine parts, warehouse details, part numbers, descriptions, on-hand quantities, average costs, extended costs, last used dates, and obsolescence calculations.
source_file: Thailand - G580 - Inventory & Aged WIP THB.xlsx
